column4: Tesla to clarify how customers may disclose problems
column5: WASHINGTON Tesla Motors Inc on Friday revised a nondisclosure clause in its customer repair agreements after a U.S. regulator took issue with the practice  while the electric carmaker's chief executive separately called most customer reports of suspension problems in its Model S sedan fraudulent.

column4: UPDATE 2-Tesla to clarify how customers may disclose problems
column5: WASHINGTON  June 10 Tesla Motors Inc on Friday revised a nondisclosure clause in its customer repair agreements after a U.S. regulator took issue with the practice  while the electric carmaker's chief executive separately called most customer reports of suspension problems in its Model S sedan fraudulent.
